function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential difficulty in dealing with low-resolution images","Impact":"Inability to effectively process images from certain surveillance cameras, leading to reduced accuracy in detection and classification","Mitigation":"Utilizing Fully Convolutional Networks (FCNs) and other existing methodologies designed to handle low-resolution images","Technologies":"Fully Convolutional Networks (FCNs)","People":"Developers, researchers, and engineers working on image classification and detection","Owner":"Research institutions, tech companies, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Challenges in detecting small objects in images","Impact":"Reduced accuracy in detecting and classifying small objects, limiting the effectiveness of the model for surveillance purposes","Mitigation":"Implementing a pyramid technique to enhance the receptive field and extract different scales of the image, and performing multi-scale detection in the head section","Technologies":"Pyramid technique, multi-scale detection methods","People":"Developers, researchers, and engineers working on image classification and detection","Owner":"Research institutions, tech companies, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Loss of local information during feature extraction process","Impact":"Diminished ability to fine-tune the model and predict accurately, leading to reduced performance in image classification and detection","Mitigation":"Utilizing PANet approach to retain and strengthen localized information from bottom layers in the top layers","Technologies":"PANet approach","People":"Developers, researchers, and engineers working on image classification and detection","Owner":"Research institutions, tech companies, and government agencies"}]}
